c.GRTL-CLASS-DEFINITION.ua.CLASS-DESCRIPTION: Core class definition for objects that can be referred to via a key. The key attribute stores the value of the key for each instance.

g2:Structure.g2:sa.ATTRIBUTE-INITIAL-VALUE: Copyright 1986 - 2017 Gensym Corporation. All Rights Reserved.
Developed by: Gensym Application Technology Version: 4.3 Beta Rev. 0 For use with G2 version: 7.1 Rev. 0 Copyright 1991 - 2004

g2:c.FUNCTION-DEFINITION.g2:a.TEXT: pad (T, S, C) = (if length-of-text (T) < S then pad ("[T][C]", S, C) else T)

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: Copyright 1986 - 2017 Gensym Corporation. All Rights Reserved.
Developed by: Gensym Application Technology Version: 4.3 Beta Rev. 0 For use with G2 version: 7.1 Rev. 0 Copyright 1991 - 2004

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Turn off GLF logging
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: conclude that the glf-logging-enabled of every glf-logging-manager = false

g2:c.TEXT-INSERTER.g2:a.TEXT: display a table of the text, protools-author, protools-person-responsible, protools-priority, and protools-target-software-version of every protools-to-do PTD such that the protools-target-software-version of PTD = the text of current-gdanol-version
display a table of every value-array v such that the item s1 superior to v exists and such that the item s2 superior to s1 exists and such that s2 is a gold-book

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Uninitialize Gold Books
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: for any gold-book Book unconditionally in order start gold-uninitialize (Book, This Window) and make Book permanent

g2:c.TEXT-INSERTER.g2:a.TEXT: show on a workspace every procedure P containing " inform the " and not assigned to module protools and not assigned to module top
display a table of the table-header and notes of every item with notes and not assigned to module devtools and not assigned to module top

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Hide all WS
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: in order hide every kb-workspace on this window and show top-top-level on this window and show protools-top-level on this window and show this workspace on this window

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Fix Printer Setup
Clear dialog pools
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: for any uil-dialog Dlg in order unconditionally start uil-clear-transient-dialog-pool (Dlg)

g2:c.TEXT-INSERTER.g2:a.TEXT: show on a workspace every item containing "/tmp" or containing "/home"

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Save GDA/NOL modules to SOURCE
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: start grm-save-gdanol-modules (the symbol SOURCE, this window)

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: Configure the free texts on the GRM workspace!!!
After Save, restart G2 to make sure that GOLD books were actually cleared... except that this will mess up some of the other things that were cleared.
Show every protools-to-do for this version
Turn rule highlighting off (run options, main menu)
Clear out all On Line Doc settings
Reset G2 and do this inspect??
The SetupBuild batch file should ALREADY have been run

g2:c.TEXT-INSERTER.g2:a.TEXT: display a table of the table-header, notes, names, gfr-module-name, gfr-package-name, gfr-version-description, gfr-minimum-g2-version, gfr-version-number, and gfr-oldest-compatible-version of every gfr-version-information-object
show on a workspace every procedure whose status is incomplete
display a table of the table-header and notes of every item with notes and not assigned to module devtools and not assigned to module top

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: Load gdaapps, nolapps & each of the shipped demos, with the distribution kbs just created, resolve conflicts, reset the KB & save changes. NOTE: for gdaapps & nolapps save all required modules.

g2:c.TEXT-INSERTER.g2:a.TEXT: show on a workspace every nol-rpc-interface

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: Get rid of Gdadev1, Protools & Ptroot in that order

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Show copyright screens
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: in order change the text of the g2-user-mode of this window to "administrator" and show the subworkspace of gdl-copyright-notice at the center of the screen and change the text of the g2-user-mode of this window to "developer"

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: Use inspect to show every nol-rpc-interface and delete the named ones

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Save GDA/NOL modules to Distribution
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: start grm-save-gdanol-modules (the symbol DIST, this window)

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Save GDA/NOL modules to DEV
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: start grm-save-gdanol-modules (the symbol DEV, this window)

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: Run the SetupRelease batch file to copy the files to the directories from which GDA & NOL will be promoted.

g2:c.TEXT-INSERTER.g2:a.TEXT: show on a workspace every module-information with notes

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: in order create a uil-title-block xx by cloning nolui-top-level and transfer xx to this workspace

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: If GDA does not start up because of GLF logging, go to gda-alarm-default-log-manager and turn enable logging to false

c.GRM-DATA-OBJECT.ua.ARM-GCC-COPYRIGHT: Copyright 1986 - 2015 Gensym Corporation. All Rights Reserved.
c.GRM-DATA-OBJECT.ua.ARM-GDL-COPYRIGHT: Developed by: Gensym Application Technology Version: 4.5 Beta Rev. 0 For use with G2 version: 8.1 Beta Rev. 0 Copyright 1991 - 2005

g2:c.PROCEDURE.g2:a.TEXT:
release-inspect-callback (S: symbol, Tot: integer, Exed: integer, Matches: integer, Seq: sequence, UData: class parameter)
begin
if Exed = Tot then conclude that UData = Matches else conclude that UData = -1;
end

g2:c.FUNCTION-DEFINITION.g2:a.TEXT: release-get-module-Item (X) = (If the workspace of X exists then get-module-ws (the workspace of X) else if the item superior to X exists then get-module-item (the item superior to X) else "unspecified")

release-get-module-ws (X) = (if the item superior to X exists then release-get-module-Item (the item superior to X) else (if X is not a logbook-page then "[the containing-module of X]" else "unspecified"))

g2:Structure.g2:sa.STEPDESC: Get rid of Gdadev1, Protools & Ptroot

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Resume Automated Promote From Failed Step
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: in order conclude that arm-promote-in-progress is true and start arm-resume-automated-promote-from-failed-step (this workspace, this window)

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Run Automated Promote
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: in order conclude that grm-promote-in-progress is true and start grm-run-automated-promote (false, this workspace, this window)

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: Set arm-build-data-path & save arm.kb before starting the automated promote process

Load gdaapps, nolapps & each of the shipped demos, with the distribution kbs just created, resolve conflicts, reset the KB & save changes.
NOTE: for gdaapps & nolapps save all required modules.
